title: Research and implement shfmt auto-formatting for script/ files
description:
Determine the best approach to auto-format all shell scripts in the script/ directory using shfmt. Options to research:
- Git hooks (pre-commit)
- CI/CD integration
- VS Code formatting
- Other automation approaches

Goal: Establish a consistent shell script formatting process across the codebase.
